thread.title: Loud Cannabis - The World's First Online Marijuana Auction Site and Farm-to-Table Delivery Service, to Premier New Technology at Cannabis World Congress & Business Expo
thread.title_full: Loud Cannabis - The World's First Online Marijuana Auction Site and Farm-to-Table Delivery Service, to Premier New Technology at Cannabis World Congress & Business Expo

author: admin
title: Loud Cannabis - The World's First Online Marijuana Auction Site and Farm-to-Table Delivery Service, to Premier New Technology at Cannabis World Congress & Business Expo
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: The Green Exchange, Inc. 
LOS ANGELES, Sept. 8, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- The Green Exchange, Inc., the developer's of "Loud Cannabis" ( www.tryloud.com ), the world's first HIPAA compliant Farm-to-Table marijuana delivery service, and "Big Green Exchange" - the nation's only certified online medical marijuana auction site, has announced that they will be exhibiting new technologies at the Cannabis World Congress & Business Expo ( CWCB ), September 16-18, at the Los Angeles Convention Center. 
The company is the first to offer California medical marijuana patients with high quality, organic, pesticide-free cannabis, delivered fresh from the farm - directly to their home. 
The company has also developed a unique portal where growers and dispensaries can connect, establish relationships, and even purchase cannabis on an innovative auction platform. 
The Green Exchange made national headlines recently when it was widely reported that insiders at Google, some of whom are closely tied to other marijuana companies, allegedly conspired to keep Loud Cannabis off of Google Play. 
The company was founded by a unique collaboration between cannabis farmers and technology developers in Northern California. 
The mission of the company is to serve growers, collectives and medical marijuana patients who want the freshest organic cannabis available; connect them in unique and elegant ways; and facilitate the exchange of their goods and services. 
"We are pleased to demonstrating our range of new technologies and services at the Cannabis World Congress and Business Expo," said Joshua Artman, Founder and CEO of The Green Exchange. "Come to our booth and meet our team, and find out how we can help virtually everyone in the cannabis eco-sphere grow stronger." 
The company will be exhibiting at booth 516. 
For more information, contact The Green Exchange at: 510-982-6052, or visit: www.tryloud.com
